languages.text: "Если ты хочешь быть частью моей команды — слушай приказы, а не отправляйся самовольно на приключения".
"If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."
languages.original_text: "Если ты хочешь быть частью моей команды — слушай приказы, а не отправляйся самовольно на приключения".

traits.locale_text: "If you wish to be a part of my crew — follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."
"If you wish to be a part of my crew — follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."
"If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."
"If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."
"If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."

languages.text: “如果你还想留在我的船上，那你必须遵守我的命令，不得擅自冒险。”
languages.original_text: "If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."

traits.locale_text: “如果你还想留在我的船上，那你必须遵守我的命令，不得擅自冒险。”

languages.text: «Si quiere formar parte de mi tripulación, empiece por acatar las órdenes que recibe en lugar de emprender aventuras por cuenta propia».
languages.original_text: "If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."

traits.locale_text: «Si quiere formar parte de mi tripulación, empiece por acatar las órdenes que recibe en lugar de emprender aventuras por cuenta propia».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}のクルーの一員になりたいのなら、勝手に冒険をするのではなく、与えられた命令に従うように」
languages.original_text: "If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}のクルーの一員になりたいのなら、勝手に冒険をするのではなく、与えられた命令に従うように」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr zu meiner Crew gehören wollt, müsst Ihr Befehle befolgen, anstatt Euch ohne Erlaubnis in eigene Abenteuer zu stürzen."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr zu meiner Crew gehören wollt, müsst Ihr Befehle befolgen, anstatt Euch ohne Erlaubnis in eigene Abenteuer zu stürzen."

languages.text: « Si vous souhaitez vous joindre à mon équipage, suivez les ordres que l'on vous donne au lieu de partir à l'aventure sans permission. »
languages.original_text: "If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous souhaitez vous joindre à mon équipage, suivez les ordres que l'on vous donne au lieu de partir à l'aventure sans permission. »

languages.text: "Mürettebatımın parçası olmak istiyorsan verilen emirleri uygulayacaksın. Kendi maceralarının peşinden izinsiz koşmayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "If you wish to be part of my crew, follow the orders given to you instead of going on adventures without leave."

traits.locale_text: "Mürettebatımın parçası olmak istiyorsan verilen emirleri uygula. İzin almadan kendi maceralarının peşinden koşma."
